__e: Ricky is as good as dead
So, you say this Ricky is a special friend, huh?
We're not afraid, Ricky is here!
Ricky and I were great friends for 3 years.
If you want to call Ricky up and have him come over here, that's fine with me.
Then your dare is, you have to call Ricky up and tell him you think he's cute!
And Ricky, what do you think you're doing?
